LanguageData.ZeroGSickness.description: Temporary disorientation caused by lack of gravity.
LanguageData.ZeroGSickness.stages.0.label: initial-hidden
LanguageData.ZeroGSickness.stages.1.label: off-balance

LanguageData.ThrusterSpeed.label: EVA thrusters online
LanguageData.SpaceHypoxia.label: hypoxia
LanguageData.SpaceHypoxia.description: Organ failure due to lack of oxygen. Quickly fatal if no EVA suit or life-supported room can be found.
LanguageData.SpaceHypoxia.stages.0.label: initial
LanguageData.SpaceHypoxia.stages.1.label: minor
LanguageData.SpaceHypoxia.stages.2.label: serious
LanguageData.SpaceHypoxia.stages.3.label: extreme
LanguageData.SpaceHypoxia.stages.4.label: extreme
LanguageData.SpaceBeltBubbleHediff.description: This creature is surrounded by a protective bubble, allowing it to survive vacuum exposure.
LanguageData.SpaceBeltBubbleHediff.label: survival bubble
